prompt_text: Check the time. If it's between 6 AM and 9 AM, turn on the Office WLED to 50% with a warm white color. If it's between 5 PM and 8 PM, turn on all living room lights to 80% and set the Office WLED to 100% with a cool white color. If it's after 9 PM, only turn on the Office WLED to 20% brightness. Wait 5 seconds after any action, then turn off all other lights that weren't part of the selected time-based action.
automation_yaml:
id: 'time_based_office_living_room_lighting'
alias: Time-based Office WLED and Living Room
description: "Time-based office and living room routine centered around Office WLED with cleanup of unused lights"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: event
    event_type: my_custom_time_lighting_trigger
conditions: []
action:
  - choose:
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "06:00:00"
            before: "09:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 50
              rgb_color:
                - 255
                - 200
                - 150
          - delay: "00:00:05"
          - service: light.turn_off
            target:
              entity_id:
                - light.living_room_2
                - light.hue_office_back_left
                - light.hue_color_downlight_1_6
                - light.hue_color_downlight_1_7
                - light.hue_color_downlight_2_2
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "17:00:00"
            before: "20:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
            data:
              brightness_pct: 80
              rgb_color:
                - 200
                - 220
                - 255
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 100
              rgb_color:
                - 200
                - 220
                - 255
          - delay: "00:00:05"
          - service: light.turn_off
            target:
              entity_id:
                - light.hue_office_back_left
                - light.hue_color_downlight_1_6
                - light.hue_color_downlight_1_7
                - light.hue_color_downlight_2_2
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "21:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 20
              rgb_color:
                - 255
                - 160
                - 100
          - delay: "00:00:05"
          - service: light.turn_off
            target:
              entity_id:
                - light.living_room_2
                - light.hue_office_back_left
                - light.hue_color_downlight_1_6
                - light.hue_color_downlight_1_7
                - light.hue_color_downlight_2_2

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: selected time, living_room, office, living
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten
